name: Professional Website Offer
subject: Website Development for {{business_name}}
content:
Hello,

I noticed {{business_name}} doesn't currently have a website. In today's digital age, this represents a significant business opportunity.

As a web developer specializing in {{business_type}} businesses, I can help you:

1. Establish a professional online presence
2. Appear in Google searches for '{{business_type}} in {{location}}'
3. Convert online visitors into paying customers
4. Automate appointment bookings and inquiries

I'd like to offer you a free mock-up design showing how your website could look. No obligation - just a chance to see the possibilities for your business.

If you're interested, we can schedule a quick 15-minute Zoom call to discuss your business goals and I can show you some examples. Just reply with a few dates/times that work best for you.

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}
{{company_name}}

P.S. If you'd like to learn more about how websites impact {{business_type}} businesses, I'm happy to share additional industry research and statistics.
